properties.name: Ziggurat of Ur
properties.description: 4,000-year-old Sumerian step pyramid, one of the best-preserved ziggurats. Birthplace of Abraham according to tradition.

properties.name: Uruk
properties.description: Possibly the world's first city (4500 BCE), birthplace of writing. Home of legendary King Gilgamesh.

properties.name: Eridu
properties.description: The oldest city in southern Mesopotamia according to Sumerian King List. Only 2% excavated.

properties.name: Mesopotamian Marshes
properties.description: UNESCO World Heritage wetlands. Boat tours through reed beds, traditional Marsh Arab mudhif guest houses, water buffalo herds.

properties.name: Basra Old Town
properties.description: Historic port city on the Shatt al-Arab waterway. Ottoman-era architecture, traditional souks, Sinbad's legendary home port.
